hibernate-mapping.query: from Lcinterimorder li where li.legalcase.id=? ORDER BY iodate desc
from Lcinterimorder li where li.legalcase=? and li.iodate=?
from Lcinterimorder li where li.legalcase=? and li.iodate=? and li.id!=?
from Lcinterimorder li where li.legalcase=? and li.iodate>?
from Lcinterimorder li where li.legalcase=? and li.iodate>? and li.id!=?
from Lcinterimorder li where li.legalcase=? and li.interimOrder=? and li.id!=?
from Lcinterimorder li where li.legalcase=? and li.interimOrder=?
from Lcinterimorder li where li.legalcase.lcNumber=? ORDER BY iodate desc
from Lcinterimorder li where li.legalcase=? and li.interimOrder.interimOrderType=? and li.iodate<?
